title: Viacom CEO Bob Bakish on Streaming, Merging With CBS, and the Stock
text:
CBS is easily bigger than Viacom, both in stock market value and recent profits. So with the companies set to recombine after nearly 14 years apart, how did Viacom’s chief of three years, Bob Bakish, get the nod from the Redstone family, which controls both companies, to run the whole show?
